data.shortDescription:
This spell functions like @Compendium[pf1.spells.w6bdfme0t8frk73p]{animal aspect}, except you can either gain two aspects at once or one aspect that adds effects to the aspects that animal aspect grants, as described below.
Frog: You gain a Swim speed equal to half your normal speed, and all the benefits of having a swim speed.
Gorilla: You gain a +2 competence bonus on @Compendium[pf1.skills.YYmmxDgp0g3ltSUG]{Perception} checks, and a +1 competence bonus on Fortitude saves.
Monkey: You gain a +4 competence bonus on @Compendium[pf1.skills.HPsdXjjRtKNGFGRc]{Acrobatics} checks.
Otter: Your swim speed increases to your full normal speed, and you need not make concentration checks to cast spells underwater.
Raccoon: Your competence bonuses on @Compendium[pf1.skills.CCy1fajKKU3K02iQ]{Disable Device}, @Compendium[pf1.skills.zK0CbvpYLZhTN5Wn]{Sleight of Hand}, and @Compendium[pf1.skills.T6nefKotIb5vKE9h]{Stealth} checks increase to +4.
Raptor: Your enhancement bonus to speed increases to +30 feet, and you gain the benefit of the @Compendium[pf1.feats.bXeW4kLCErPBFpNB]{Run} feat.
Tree Lizard: You gain a +4 competence bonus on @Compendium[pf1.skills.T6nefKotIb5vKE9h]{Stealth} checks.
